data.text: How often do you take a book with you on a flight? data.text: Even if you've been around the world and have visited many of the world's air harbors, you're sure to remember the Heydar Aliyev airport in Baku for ever. Did you know that there are four-legged assistants working in our team?🤗🐕 These are Sulimov dogs, or shabaks, or shalaikas, as you may call them. This unique hybrid of a Reindeer Herder and North Caucasian jackal is distinguished by its superior sense of smell and intellect🐶🐾 https://t.co/ywX9d7UbTw

Beside Maintower, Romer and Goethe's House, Frankfurt on Main has another attraction. It is located in the airport of the city and is called the Forum. Walking on its 400 square meters, you can learn everything about the history of the airport in an interactive format 😉🙌✈️ https://t.co/pmQn4wHSbP
